title: I’m Sick and Tired of My Childhood Friend’s, Now Girlfriend’s, Constant Abuse so I Broke up With Her - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Appearance Changes   Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Psychopaths   R-15   Stalkers   Tsundere   Yandere
author: Ononata Manimani   斧名田マニマニ
description:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore. 

So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option. 

And thus, the story of my break up begins…
>
